site_title: Origami Delta by Gary J. Hinze

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is Paper plane 19 of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. The Origami Delta by Gary J. Hinze. This is an origami plane folded from a square sheet. This model is found in the salvaged notes of Gary J. Hinze found in the following link: http://www.endlesslift.com/paper-airplanes/ If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 018 : SST Origami Plane by James M. Sakoda", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/Sc3sw4WK3B0 Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art

block_list.title: More Designs from Gary J. Hinze
block_list.body: • Origami Delta by Gary J. Hinze
